Red Sox 8, Orioles 6

Sox beat Orioles for 3-game streak

Dustin Pedroia had 2 RBI and the Red Sox beat the Orioles to get to .500 for their third win in a row.

Celtics 101, Sixers 85

Celtics win Game 5, Sixers on the brink of elimination

The Celtics turned a halftime deficit into a second-half rout, beating the Sixers in Game 5 and putting the team in position to close out the series Wednesday. (Boston Globe)
  • Celtics, Sixers react to big game by Brandon Bass
  • Pictures Scenes from Game 5

Schilling company has laid off workers

Rhode Island Gov. Lincoln Chafee said Monday that state officials are continuing to try to "protect every penny" of the state's investment in Curt Schilling's company. (AP)
  • R.I.'s big bet on Curt Schilling raises questions

Panel against PSA tests for prostates

A government panel concluded on Monday that harm from the widely used test to screen for prostate cancer outweighed its benefits in all age groups. (Boston Globe)

Bates freshman dies in Scotland

A Bates College freshman collapsed and died after taking a twilight dip in the ocean while participating in a study-abroad program, school officials said. (AP)
  • 4 killed BU students remembered in ceremonies

Facebook stock down in 2nd trading day

The social media network's stock was down more than 10 percent from Friday's closing price, a sharp dip after high expectations from its IPO. (AP)
  • Facebook COO to speak at Harvard on Wednesday
  • Kayak, travel site with local ties, to start IPO road show

Thomas H. O'Connor, of BC considered 'dean' of Boston's historians, dies at 89

O'Connor, the unofficial dean of Boston history and a fixture for more than six decades on the Boston College faculty, died Sunday in Milton. (Boston Globe)
  • Pictures More notable deaths of 2012

Business

Global Business Hub

What does collaboration mean?

Collaboration is much more than two or more people working together; it’s about communicating and learning with others in order to create something you couldn’t possibly have created alone.
